item.title: Thursford, @RowanYarns magazine 59, stashed Vintage Denim :)
item.description:
Thursford, @RowanYarns magazine 59, stashed Vintage Denim :)

Knit this raglan sweater designed by Amy Herzog in Original Denim as featured in Rowan Knitting & Crochet Magazine 59. It has a stocking stitch body and simple textured sleeves making it suitable for the less experienced knitter.

item.title: Rowan Denim.....after the hot wash and dryer treatment...
item.description: Rowan Denim.....after the hot wash and dryer treatment...

item.title: Magazine 59! Two gorgeous stories - Coastal and Kyoto.....which do you prefer?
item.description:
Magazine 59! Two gorgeous stories - Coastal and Kyoto.....which do you prefer?

Magazine 59 is here and there are two stories for the Spring/Summer 2016 collection, 'Coastal' and 'Kyoto'. Coastal is a collection of wearable designs for both men and women, whereas Kyoto is an elegant collection of womenswear, inspired by all things Japanese.
